articles.author: Gary Fineout
articles.title: AFL-CIO scraps Orlando presidential forum
articles.description: Coronavirus fears shut down Biden-Sanders event.
articles.content:
Getty
TALLAHASSEE The AFL-CIO today canceled a Florida forum featuring Democratic presidential candidates Bernie Sanders and Joe Biden.

articles.title: Maryland governor criticizes Trump’s statements on coronavirus
articles.description: Larry Hogan says Mike Pence is doing a better job of communicating what needs to be communicated.
articles.content:
Has the president been perfect in his communication? I would say he hasn't communicated the way I would, and the way I might like him to, he added. But I think the rest of the team has been doing a pretty good job.
